DialogueRecords.Speaker: Bruno
DialogueRecords.Text: I don't have any reason to visit Slyph right now.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Blake
DialogueRecords.Text: I can't wait until I'm old enough to train and be a spirit talker too!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Slyph
DialogueRecords.Text: Slyph is now available to summon!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Undine
DialogueRecords.Text: Undine is now available to summon!
